captions.text: In March, we were filming a prank
And after we were done filming the prank, we were heading back to our car
We ran into a homeless man with a cool talent
He could move his mustache, kind of make it dance
So we filmed it, we put it on our second channel
And within about a week, it got over a million views
We set up a crowdfunding campaign for him, where we raised over $2,600
That just ended a couple of days ago, so today we're gonna go find him
We're gonna give him 3,000 just as a little extra
We have a Blenders In The Grass gift card
We got some clothes that we're gonna give him, some limited edition whatever clothing
We're gonna find Clydesdale right now
What's up, Clydesdale?
What up
Hey! -What's up, Clydesdale?
Hey, how are ya?
You gotta be kidding me
No way, no. Wait a minute
3,000 dollars in tens
You gotta be... -oh my word!
A total of 189 people donated to the campaign
The video has almost two million views now
And you probably made over a million people smile
Wow, that is a...I don't know what to say, you guys
I'm really speechless, I don't know what to do. I better go to my bank, I better go find a bank
Holy smokes
We also have a hat for you.
There you go. That's my school colors.
And here's a T-shirt. -Oh, nice
School color's nice. I like orange anyway. I like orange
The last Harley was orange, by the way
And what about this?
Look at the front
Yeah!
You're gonna be the coolest one. -Nice. That is bad, you guys
We have a Blenders in the Grass gift card
You guys, wow
Thank you, everybody. Thanks for giving me a spark in life
Then you got the caterpillar, of course
Before he was doing wheelies like...
Peace out, love you guys

comments.text:
Oh, I was assuming they gave him 3K of their own money. If that's the case 
then perhaps they broke even on the adsense revenue. BTW giving people 
money doesn't help them. Encouraging people to make a life for themselves 
does. I think what they should have done is help him get connections to use 
his talents in ways that enable him to continue to make money.﻿

comments.text:
lol you people are so naive. It's very kind that you gave him that much 
cash but you should never EVER have filmed it nevermind published on 
YouTube.

You know as a homeless man he lives on the streets or at the very best goes 
to sleep in a shelter full of dodgy people like drug addicts and criminals. 
And now 5 million people know who this guy is and that he has 3k in cash on 
him. See where I'm going?﻿

proportion.

comments.text:

preventing them from seeking change. Do not give homeless people

comments.text: +Karsten Lane that's an assumption and stereotype asshole.
comments.author: Troy Adkins

comments.text:
+Karsten Lane That is untrue. It depends on who the homeless person is. If 
you see someone smoking cigarettes you should automatically avoid giving 
them money. Most homeless people actually would buy clothes or food with 
that money that you give them. You would have had to be homeless firsthand 
to know how homeless people do spend their money.
